00054 #define GS(a)   (*((short *)(a)))

00057 
00058 static GHash* gIcons = NULL;
00059 
00060 static int gNextIconId = 1;
00061 
00062 static int gFirstIconId = 1;
00063 
00064 
00065 static void icon_free(void *val)
00066 {
00067     Icon* icon = val;
00068 
00069     if (icon) {
00070         if (icon->drawinfo_free) {      
00071             icon->drawinfo_free(icon->drawinfo);
00072         }
00073         else if (icon->drawinfo) {
00074             MEM_freeN(icon->drawinfo);
00075         }
00076         MEM_freeN(icon);
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00080 /* create an id for a new icon and make sure that ids from deleted icons get reused
00081  * after the integer number range is used up */
00082 static int get_next_free_id(void)
00083 {
00084     int startId = gFirstIconId;
00085 
00086     /* if we haven't used up the int number range, we just return the next int */
00087     if (gNextIconId>=gFirstIconId)
00088         return gNextIconId++;
00089     
00090     /* now we try to find the smallest icon id not stored in the gIcons hash */
00091     while (BLI_ghash_lookup(gIcons, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(startId)) && startId>=gFirstIconId) 
00092         startId++;
00093 
00094     /* if we found a suitable one that isn't used yet, return it */
00095     if (startId>=gFirstIconId)
00096         return startId;
00097 
00098     /* fail */
00099     return 0;
00100 }
00101 
00102 void BKE_icons_init(int first_dyn_id)
00103 {
00104     gNextIconId = first_dyn_id;
00105     gFirstIconId = first_dyn_id;
00106 
00107     if (!gIcons)
00108         gIcons = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_inthash, BLI_ghashutil_intcmp, "icons_init gh");
00109 }
00110 
00111 void BKE_icons_free(void)
00112 {
00113     if (gIcons)
00114         BLI_ghash_free(gIcons, NULL, icon_free);
00115     gIcons = NULL;
00116 }
00117 
00118 struct PreviewImage* BKE_previewimg_create(void) 
00119 {
00120     PreviewImage* prv_img = NULL;
00121     int i;
00122 
00123     prv_img = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PreviewImage), "img_prv");
00124 
00125     for (i=0; i<NUM_ICON_SIZES; ++i) {
00126         prv_img->changed[i] = 1;
00127         prv_img->changed_timestamp[i] = 0;
00128     }
00129     return prv_img;
00130 }
00131 
00132 void BKE_previewimg_freefunc(void *link)
00133 {
00134     PreviewImage *prv = (PreviewImage *)link;
00135     if (prv) {
00136         int i;
00137 
00138         for (i=0; i<NUM_ICON_SIZES;++i) {
00139             if (prv->rect[i]) {
00140                 MEM_freeN(prv->rect[i]);
00141                 prv->rect[i] = NULL;
00142             }
00143         }
00144         MEM_freeN(prv);
00145     }
00146 }
00147 
00148 void BKE_previewimg_free(PreviewImage **prv)
00149 {
00150     if (prv && (*prv)) {
00151         BKE_previewimg_freefunc(*prv);
00152         *prv = NULL;
00153     }
00154 }
00155 
00156 struct PreviewImage* BKE_previewimg_copy(PreviewImage *prv) 
00157 {
00158     PreviewImage* prv_img = NULL;
00159     int i;
00160 
00161     if (prv) {
00162         prv_img = MEM_dupallocN(prv);
00163         for (i=0; i < NUM_ICON_SIZES; ++i) {
00164             if (prv->rect[i]) {
00165                 prv_img->rect[i] = MEM_dupallocN(prv->rect[i]);
00166             }
00167             else {
00168                 prv_img->rect[i] = NULL;
00169             }
00170         }
00171     }
00172     return prv_img;
00173 }
00174 
00175 void BKE_previewimg_free_id(ID *id) 
00176 {
00177     if (GS(id->name) == ID_MA) {
00178         Material *mat = (Material*)id;  
00179         BKE_previewimg_free(&mat->preview);
00180     }
00181     else if (GS(id->name) == ID_TE) {
00182         Tex *tex = (Tex*)id;
00183         BKE_previewimg_free(&tex->preview);
00184     }
00185     else if (GS(id->name) == ID_WO) {
00186         World *wo = (World*)id;
00187         BKE_previewimg_free(&wo->preview);
00188     }
00189     else if (GS(id->name) == ID_LA) {
00190         Lamp *la  = (Lamp*)id;
00191         BKE_previewimg_free(&la->preview);
00192     }
00193     else if (GS(id->name) == ID_IM) {
00194         Image *img  = (Image*)id;
00195         BKE_previewimg_free(&img->preview);
00196     }
00197     else if (GS(id->name) == ID_BR) {
00198         Brush *br  = (Brush*)id;
00199         BKE_previewimg_free(&br->preview);
00200     }
00201 }
00202 
00203 PreviewImage* BKE_previewimg_get(ID *id) 
00204 {
00205     PreviewImage* prv_img = NULL;
00206 
00207     if (GS(id->name) == ID_MA) {
00208         Material *mat = (Material*)id;  
00209         if (!mat->preview) mat->preview = BKE_previewimg_create();
00210         prv_img = mat->preview;
00211     }
00212     else if (GS(id->name) == ID_TE) {
00213         Tex *tex = (Tex*)id;
00214         if (!tex->preview) tex->preview = BKE_previewimg_create();
00215         prv_img = tex->preview;
00216     }
00217     else if (GS(id->name) == ID_WO) {
00218         World *wo = (World*)id;
00219         if (!wo->preview) wo->preview = BKE_previewimg_create();
00220         prv_img = wo->preview;
00221     }
00222     else if (GS(id->name) == ID_LA) {
00223         Lamp *la  = (Lamp*)id;
00224         if (!la->preview) la->preview = BKE_previewimg_create();
00225         prv_img = la->preview;
00226     }
00227     else if (GS(id->name) == ID_IM) {
00228         Image *img  = (Image*)id;
00229         if (!img->preview) img->preview = BKE_previewimg_create();
00230         prv_img = img->preview;
00231     }
00232     else if (GS(id->name) == ID_BR) {
00233         Brush *br  = (Brush*)id;
00234         if (!br->preview) br->preview = BKE_previewimg_create();
00235         prv_img = br->preview;
00236     }
00237 
00238     return prv_img;
00239 }
00240 
00241 void BKE_icon_changed(int id)
00242 {
00243     Icon* icon = NULL;
00244     
00245     if (!id || G.background) return;
00246 
00247     icon = BLI_ghash_lookup(gIcons, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(id));
00248     
00249     if (icon) {
00250         PreviewImage *prv = BKE_previewimg_get((ID*)icon->obj);
00251 
00252         /* all previews changed */
00253         if (prv) {
00254             int i;
00255             for (i=0; i<NUM_ICON_SIZES; ++i) {
00256                 prv->changed[i] = 1;
00257                 prv->changed_timestamp[i]++;
00258             }
00259         }
00260     }   
00261 }
00262 
00263 int BKE_icon_getid(struct ID* id)
00264 {
00265     Icon* new_icon = NULL;
00266 
00267     if (!id || G.background)
00268         return 0;
00269 
00270     if (id->icon_id)
00271         return id->icon_id;
00272 
00273     id->icon_id = get_next_free_id();
00274 
00275     if (!id->icon_id) {
00276         printf("BKE_icon_getid: Internal error - not enough IDs\n");
00277         return 0;
00278     }
00279 
00280     new_icon = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Icon), "texicon");
00281 
00282     new_icon->obj = id;
00283     new_icon->type = GS(id->name);
00284     
00285     /* next two lines make sure image gets created */
00286     new_icon->drawinfo = NULL;
00287     new_icon->drawinfo_free = NULL;
00288 
00289     BLI_ghash_insert(gIcons, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(id->icon_id), new_icon);
00290     
00291     return id->icon_id;
00292 }
00293 
00294 Icon* BKE_icon_get(int icon_id)
00295 {
00296     Icon* icon = NULL;
00297 
00298     icon = BLI_ghash_lookup(gIcons, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(icon_id));
00299     
00300     if (!icon) {
00301         printf("BKE_icon_get: Internal error, no icon for icon ID: %d\n", icon_id);
00302         return NULL;
00303     }
00304 
00305     return icon;
00306 }
00307 
00308 void BKE_icon_set(int icon_id, struct Icon* icon)
00309 {
00310     Icon* old_icon = NULL;
00311 
00312     old_icon = BLI_ghash_lookup(gIcons, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(icon_id));
00313 
00314     if (old_icon) {
00315         printf("BKE_icon_set: Internal error, icon already set: %d\n", icon_id);
00316         return;
00317     }
00318 
00319     BLI_ghash_insert(gIcons, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(icon_id), icon);
00320 }
00321 
00322 void BKE_icon_delete(struct ID* id)
00323 {
00324 
00325     if (!id->icon_id) return; /* no icon defined for library object */
00326 
00327     BLI_ghash_remove(gIcons, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(id->icon_id), NULL, icon_free);
00328     id->icon_id = 0;
00329 }
